STID_ASTAROTH_NAME: Astaroth, The Great Servant of Evil
STID_TROLL_NAME: Grond, The Guardian of the pass
STID_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION_WASTELAND: Before monsters attack, it was one of the biggest wheat field. At least quarter of kingdom used this wheat for food. Now it's just a wasteland, without fertile soil, without rivers, only sands and dry air... and a lotta monsters, even rats turned into something scary.
STID_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION_CANYON: Well, this is the shortest way to forest. No one except hunters didn't use it. Now, because of monsters even hunters step other way. People always prefer to road around mountains, it's safer than go through valley. The most brave hunters says that the pass guard huge troll, but I don't believe this hunters fable.
STID_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION_FOREST: The forest always seemed unsafe and scary place, even before monsters attack. However, it had a lotta wild animals, by which hunters earned gold and fed common people. Now that place considered cursed.
STID_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION_CASTLE: Many years ago that castle belonged to King, which engaged in necromancy when got old, trying to prolong his life. One day his ritual got out of control and he vaporised. Travelers says that monsters began appearing exactly form the castle.
STID_TAVERN_WELCOME_2: You've been on the run all day. Relax! Take a seat.
STID_TAVERN_WELCOME_3: Warm your frozen boots by the fire!
STID_TAVERN_HAVE_JOB: - I have some job. I am looking for people, who wanna kill that cursed monsters. Do you know someone?
STID_TAVERN_HIRING_1: Actually, I know one man. He has lost his family because of monsters. They killed his wife and son then burned his house. Now he has nothing except rage and desire to destroy monsters.
STID_TAVERN_HIRING_2: Ya know, some guards from city fortress complain that they earn not enough gold for their work. I think, you can interest they.
STID_TAVERN_HIRING_3: You can ask hunters 'bout that. Ya know, monsters destroy a lotta wild animals, so hunters have less work now.
STID_TAVERN_HIRING_4: Uh... Do you see that strange man sitting in the shadows near the wall? People says that he used to service in the King's army many years ago. For sure he can handle sword... or bow... or whatever... so he may come in handy.
STID_TAVERN_NO_HIRING_1: Nope sorry. Come back later. I'm sure there is a lotta people, who wanna protect their home.
STID_VENDOR_HELLO: I have something interesting for you
